# github.com/pahasara/HyprDots

# WALLPAPER
$wall = ~/Pictures/Assets/lockscreen.png

general {
    no_fade_in = false
    no_fade_out = false
    grace = 0
}

# BACKGORUND
background {
    monitor =
    path = $wall
    blur_size = 1
    blur_passes = 3 # 0 disables blurring
    noise = 0.0117
    contrast = 1.6000 # Vibrant!!!
    brightness = 0.5000
    vibrancy = 0.2500
    vibrancy_darkness = 0.1000
}

# TIME
label {
    monitor =
    text = cmd[update:1000] echo "$(date +"%H:%M")"
    color = rgb(00bbff)
    font_size = 90
    font_family = JetBrains Mono Nerd Font Mono ExtraBold
    position = 0, 220
    halign = center
    valign = center
}

# DATE
label {
    monitor =
    text = cmd[update:1000] echo "$(date +"%A, %B %d")"
    color = rgb(EEDDFF)
    font_size = 24
    font_family = CaskaydiaMono Nerd Font Bold
    position = 0, 140
    halign = center
    valign = center
}

# IMAGE
image {
    monitor =
    path = ~/Pictures/Assets/dp.png
    size = 200
    border_size = 0
    rounding = 0
    rotate = 0
    reload_time = 0
    reload_cmd =
    position = 10, -120
    halign = center
    valign = center
}

# USER
label {
    monitor =
    text =    $USER
    color = rgb(CFCFCF)
    font_size = 22
    font_family = Ubuntu Nerd Font Bold

    position = 0, 240
    halign = center
    valign = bottom
}

# PASSWORD-BOX
input-field {
    monitor =
    size = 200, 50
    outline_thickness = 3
    dots_size = 0.26 # Scale of input-field height, 0.2 - 0.8 dots_spacing = 0.15 # Scale of dots' absolute size, 0.0 - 1.0
    dots_center = true
    dots_rounding = -1 # -1 default circle, -2 follow input-field rounding
    outer_color = rgba(00aaee44)
    inner_color = rgba(11111b29)
    font_color = rgb(00bbff)
    fade_on_empty = true
    placeholder_text = 
    hide_input = false
    rounding = -1 # -1 means complete rounding (circle/oval)
    check_color = rgb(fc6330)
    fail_color = rgb(fa3939) # if authentication failed, changes outer_color and fail message color
    fail_text = 
    fail_transition = 300 # transition time in ms between normal outer_color and fail_color
    position = 0, 170
    halign = center
    valign = bottom
}

# BOY
image {
    monitor =
    path = ~/Pictures/Assets/boy_in_black.png
    size = 460
    border_size = 0
    rounding = 0
    rotate = 0
    reload_time = 0
    reload_cmd =
    position = 0, 0
    halign = left
    valign = bottom
}

# GIRL
image {
    monitor =
    path = ~/Pictures/Assets/girl_in_black.png
    size = 650
    border_size = 0
    rounding = 0
    rotate = 0
    reload_time = 0
    reload_cmd =
    position = 0, 0
    halign = right
    valign = bottom
}

# SONG
label {
    monitor =
    text = cmd[update:1000] echo "$(~/.local/bin/now-playing max_length=50)" 
    color = rgb(00aaff)
    font_size = 20
    font_family = JetBrains Mono Nerd Font ExtraBold
    position = 0, 20
    halign = center
    valign = bottom
}

# LOCK-LOGO
label {
    monitor =
    text = 
    color = rgb(CFCFCF)
    font_size = 18
    font_family = Ubuntu Nerd Font Bold
    position = 0, 80
    halign = center
    valign = bottom
}

function fd() {
  local dir=$(find . -type d -print | fzf)
  if [[ -n "$dir" ]]; then
    cd "$dir"
    echo "Switched to: $dir"
  else
    echo "No directory chosen."
  fi
}

function fzf-cd() {
  local dir=$(find . -type d -print | fzf)
  if [[ -n "$dir" ]]; then
    cd "$dir"
    echo "Switched to: $dir"
  else
    echo "No directory chosen."
  fi
}

# Binds Ctrl+O to fd

function fzf-cd() {
  local dir=$(find . -type d -print | fzf)
  if [[ -n "$dir" ]]; then
    cd "$dir"
    echo "Switched to: $dir"
  else
    echo "No directory chosen."
  fi
}

bindkey "\ef" fzf-cd

#!/bin/bash

# Define options for the power menu
options="Lock\nLogout\nSuspend\nRestart\nShutdown"

# Prompt the user with dmenu
selected_option=$(echo -e "$options" | dmenu -i -l 5 -p "Power Menu:")

# Execute the selected option
case "$selected_option" in
    "Shutdown")
        sh ~/.dwm/scripts/uptime shutdown
        systemctl poweroff
        ;;
    "Restart")
        sh ~/.dwm/scripts/uptime reboot
        systemctl reboot
        ;;
    "Suspend")
        systemctl suspend
        ;;

    "Lock")
        betterlockscreen -l -q
        ;;
    "Logout")
        pkill -KILL -u "$USER"
        ;;
    *)
        echo "Invalid option selected."
        ;;
esac
